Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix()
      Matrix constructor initialize the field of the Matrix
      Matrix(int Nrows, int Ncols)
      Matrix constructor, created a new Matrix with given number of rows and number of columns
      Matrix(Matrix m)
      Copy constructor, created a new Matrix by copying data from a given Matrix
      Matrix(Vector x)
      Matrix constructor, create a Matrix based on a given Vector

        Ncols - the number of columns of the Matrix

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public double get(int i,
         int j)
        Returns the element at the specified position. An index ranges from 0 to nrows and an index ranges from 0 to ncols
        Parameters:
        i - the index of the row position.
        j - the index of the column position
        Returns:
        the desired element.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index i is not in the range 0 to nrows or the index j is not in the range 0 to ncols
        See Also:
        Vector.get(int)

      • set

       int j,
       double value)
        Set the value of element at the specified position. An index ranges from 0 to nrows and an index ranges from 0 to ncols

        i - the index of the row position.
        j - the index of the column position
        value - the value to assign
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index i is not in the range 0 to nrows or the index j is not in the range 0 to ncols
        See Also:

      • mult

        public Matrix mult(Matrix m)
        A method for multiplying current Matrix with another given Matrix and returning the result Matrix
        Parameters:
        m - given Matrix to multiply.
        Returns:
        result Matrix
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the the number of columns of current Matrix differ from the number of rows of given Matrix
        See Also:
        Matrix(int, int), set(int, int, double)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        result Vector
        Throws:

      • equiv

        public boolean equiv(Matrix a,
            double tol)
        A method to compare the equality of a given Matrix with current Matrix. an tolerant value is given for checking the equality.
        Parameters:
        a - a given Matrix to check equality with current one
        tol - a tolerant value for assuming equality
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of rows and number of columns of given Matrix a differ from current Matrix
        See Also:
        get(int, int)

        public Matrix transpose()
        A method to transpose current Matrix and returning result Matrix.
        Returns:
        transposed Matrix
        See Also:

      • lu_fact

        public void lu_fact(Matrix a,
           Matrix l,
           Matrix u,
           int n)
        A method to compute lower Matrix and upper Matrix of a given Matrix with specific size using LU (Doolittle's) decomposition method without pivoting
        Parameters:
        a - given Matrix where to compute upper Matrix and lower Matrix from
        l - lower Matrix to be computed
        u - upper Matrix to be computed
        n - size of Matrix
        See Also:
        Matrix(Matrix), get(int, int), set(int, int, double)

           int n,
           Matrix p)
        A method to compute reordered factor Matrix of a given Matrix with specific size
        Parameters:
        a - given Matrix which needs to be reordered
        n - size of Matrix
        p - reorder factor Matrix
        See Also:

        A method to calculate the determinant of current Matrix
        Returns:
        the determinant of current Matrix
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if Matrix is not a square Matrix: number of rows differs the number of columns
        See Also:

             Matrix u)

        Returns:
        the inversed Matrix
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the determinant of Matirx is 0

      • lu_solve

        public Vector lu_solve(Matrix l,
              Matrix u,
              Vector b)
        A method to solve a differential equation by giving its lower Matrix and upper Matrix and right side Vector
        Returns:
        the result Vector
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the the number of rows and number of columns of l Matrix differ from u Matrix: matrix size do not match
        See Also:
        get(int, int), Vector.Vector(int), Vector.get(int), Vector.set(int, double)
